trans-unit.source: Jobs Setup

seg-source.mrk: Jobs Setup

trans-unit.source: The Jobs Setup page includes two FastTabs that are used with Construction Works Processing: Measurement & Construction Works and BoQ Manager. Each is described in this section.

seg-source.mrk: The Jobs Setup page includes two FastTabs that are used with Construction Works Processing: Measurement & Construction Works and BoQ Manager.
Each is described in this section.

trans-unit.source: Measurement & Construction Works FastTab

seg-source.mrk: Measurement & Construction Works FastTab

trans-unit.source: The Measurement & Construction Works FastTab contains defaults used in Construction Works Processing.

seg-source.mrk: The Measurement & Construction Works FastTab contains defaults used in Construction Works Processing.

trans-unit.source: : Jobs Setup, Measurement & Construction Works

seg-source.mrk: : Jobs Setup, Measurement & Construction Works

trans-unit.source: The fields in this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Auto Create PaC

seg-source.mrk: Auto Create PaC

trans-unit.source: Determines whether PaC Jobs are created automatically when a BoQ Job is created. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines whether PaC Jobs are created automatically when a BoQ Job is created.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Never – Option will never be used

seg-source.mrk: Never – Option will never be used

trans-unit.source: Optional – Option will be used on request

seg-source.mrk: Optional – Option will be used on request

trans-unit.source: Always – Option will always be used

seg-source.mrk: Always – Option will always be used

trans-unit.source: PaC Auto Insert Calc. Group Totals

seg-source.mrk: PaC Auto Insert Calc.
Group Totals

trans-unit.source: Determines whether Calculation Group Totals are created automatically when the PaC Job is created. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines whether Calculation Group Totals are created automatically when the PaC Job is created.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Never – Option will never be used

seg-source.mrk: Never – Option will never be used

trans-unit.source: Optional – Option will be used on request

seg-source.mrk: Optional – Option will be used on request

trans-unit.source: Always – Option will always be used

seg-source.mrk: Always – Option will always be used

trans-unit.source: PaC Default Job Type

seg-source.mrk: PaC Default Job Type

trans-unit.source: Indicates the default Job Type to be assigned to PaC Jobs.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the default Job Type to be assigned to PaC Jobs.

trans-unit.source: Refer to section <MadCap:xref href="Job Types Setup.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Types Setup” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about the Job Types used with Construction Works Processing.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to section <MadCap:xref href="Job Types Setup.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Types Setup” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about the Job Types used with Construction Works Processing.

trans-unit.source: Exemption Certificate Code

seg-source.mrk: Exemption Certificate Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Certificate Code for Exemption Certificates that are used for validity checks on Tax No. and Tax State No.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Certificate Code for Exemption Certificates that are used for validity checks on Tax No.
and Tax State No.

trans-unit.source: Calc. Base Calculation with Status Order

seg-source.mrk: Calc.
Base Calculation with Status Order

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the Base Calculation is calculated automatically when the Job Status is set to Order. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines whether the Base Calculation is calculated automatically when the Job Status is set to Order.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Never – Option will never be used

seg-source.mrk: Never – Option will never be used

trans-unit.source: Optional – Option will be used on request

seg-source.mrk: Optional – Option will be used on request

trans-unit.source: Always – Option will always be used

seg-source.mrk: Always – Option will always be used

trans-unit.source: Autom. Project Dimension

seg-source.mrk: Autom.
Project Dimension

trans-unit.source: Indicates the dimension to be automatically created for main Projects.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the dimension to be automatically created for main Projects.

trans-unit.source: Project Account Dimension

seg-source.mrk: Project Account Dimension

trans-unit.source: Indicates the dimension to be assigned to the Project account.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the dimension to be assigned to the Project account.

trans-unit.source: Autom. Proj. Acc. Dimension

seg-source.mrk: Autom.
Proj.
Acc.
Dimension

trans-unit.source: Determines how the Project Account dimension value is created. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines how the Project Account dimension value is created.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Job No. – The Job No. is used as the dimension value.

seg-source.mrk: Job No.
– The Job No.
is used as the dimension value.

trans-unit.source: No. Series – The number series entered in the Project Account Nos. field is used as the dimension value.

seg-source.mrk: No.
Series – The number series entered in the Project Account Nos.
field is used as the dimension value.

trans-unit.source: Project No. + Index (2-digit) – The Project No. plus a 2-digit index is used as the dimension value (e.g. CON00001-01).

seg-source.mrk: Project No.
+ Index (2-digit) – The Project No.
plus a 2-digit index is used as the dimension value (e.g. CON00001-01).

trans-unit.source: Project Account Nos.

seg-source.mrk: Project Account Nos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the No. Series to be used as the Project Account dimension value if Autom. Proj. Acc. Dimension = No. Series.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the No.
Series to be used as the Project Account dimension value if <span class="Bold">Autom.
Proj.
Acc.
Dimension = No.
Series.

trans-unit.source: Project Nos.

seg-source.mrk: Project Nos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number series to be used for new Projects.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number series to be used for new Projects.

trans-unit.source: Measurement Nos.

seg-source.mrk: Measurement Nos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number series to be used for new Measurements.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number series to be used for new Measurements.

trans-unit.source: Measurement Summary Nos.

seg-source.mrk: Measurement Summary Nos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number series to be used for new Measurement Summaries.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number series to be used for new Measurement Summaries.

trans-unit.source: CS Invoicing Templ. Nos.

seg-source.mrk: CS Invoicing Templ.
Nos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number series to be used for the Construction Invoicing Template. This is the general template that will always be copied to a Construction Invoicing Schedule on Jobs or Sales Invoices.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number series to be used for the Construction Invoicing Template.
This is the general template that will always be copied to a Construction Invoicing Schedule on Jobs or Sales Invoices.

trans-unit.source: CS Invoicing Schedule Nos.

seg-source.mrk: CS Invoicing Schedule Nos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number series assigned to the Construction Invoicing Schedule that is used on Sales Invoices, e.g. for Share in Cost or other deductions.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number series assigned to the Construction Invoicing Schedule that is used on Sales Invoices, e.g. for Share in Cost or other deductions.

trans-unit.source: Component Code Wages

seg-source.mrk: Component Code Wages

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No. field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Wages are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No.

field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Wages are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

trans-unit.source: Component Code Material

seg-source.mrk: Component Code Material

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No. field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Materials are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “BoQ Job Calculations” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No.

field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Materials are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “BoQ Job Calculations” on page 1 for more information).

trans-unit.source: Component Code Ext. Service

seg-source.mrk: Component Code Ext.
Service

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No. field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for External Services are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No.

field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for External Services are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

trans-unit.source: Component Code Equipment

seg-source.mrk: Component Code Equipment

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No. field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Equipment are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No.

field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Equipment are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

trans-unit.source: Component Code Other

seg-source.mrk: Component Code Other

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No. field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Other Costs are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No.

field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Other Costs are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

trans-unit.source: Component Code Other 2

seg-source.mrk: Component Code Other 2

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No. field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Other Costs 2 are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the component code that will be entered in the No.

field of the BoQ Budget Calculation when budget lines for Other Costs 2 are created automatically from the Fast Calculation page (refer to section “Fast Calculation” on page 1 for more information) or by the GAEB Unit Price Parts functionality (refer to section “Order Award and Comparison” on page 1 for more information).

trans-unit.source: Alloy Surch. Raise Unit Cost

seg-source.mrk: Alloy Surch.
Raise Unit Cost

trans-unit.source: If selected, Alloy Surcharges directly <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2018-06-28T10:38:21.5118560-05:00" MadCap:creator="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:initials="NT" MadCap:comment="this was "reduce" - changed to "increase"" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-06-28T10:38:42.8509978-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">increase</MadCap:annotation> the Unit Cost in the Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, Alloy Surcharges directly <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2018-06-28T10:38:21.5118560-05:00" MadCap:creator="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:initials="NT" MadCap:comment="this was "reduce" - changed to "increase"" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-06-28T10:38:42.8509978-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">increase</MadCap:annotation> the Unit Cost in the Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: Unit Price Rounding Precision

seg-source.mrk: Unit Price Rounding Precision

trans-unit.source: Indicates the rounding precision for Unit Prices of sales positions. This is defaulted to the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the rounding precision for Unit Prices of sales positions.
This is defaulted to the Job Card.

trans-unit.source: Show BoQ Short Text

seg-source.mrk: Show BoQ Short Text

trans-unit.source: If selected, BoQ Short Text is shown in the Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, BoQ Short Text is shown in the Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: Show BoQ Long Text

seg-source.mrk: Show BoQ Long Text

trans-unit.source: If selected, BoQ Long Text is shown in the Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, BoQ Long Text is shown in the Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: Measurement Level Required

seg-source.mrk: Measurement Level Required

trans-unit.source: If selected, Measurement Levels are required to be selected in Measurement Documents before registration. This is defaulted to the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, Measurement Levels are required to be selected in Measurement Documents before registration.
This is defaulted to the Job Card.

trans-unit.source: Measurement Location Required

seg-source.mrk: Measurement Location Required

trans-unit.source: If selected, Measurement Locations are required to be selected in Measurement Documents before registration. This is defaulted to the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, Measurement Locations are required to be selected in Measurement Documents before registration.
This is defaulted to the Job Card.

trans-unit.source: Measurement Price Source

seg-source.mrk: Measurement Price Source

trans-unit.source: Indicates if Measurement pricing originates from the Sales Order or the BoQ Budget Calculation.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if Measurement pricing originates from the Sales Order or the BoQ Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: Measurement Report ID

seg-source.mrk: Measurement Report ID

trans-unit.source: Specifies the report that is used for printing a Measurement Document.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the report that is used for printing a Measurement Document.

trans-unit.source: BoQ Manager FastTab

seg-source.mrk: BoQ Manager FastTab

trans-unit.source: The BoQ Manager FastTab contains defaults used in BoQ processing.

seg-source.mrk: The BoQ Manager FastTab contains defaults used in BoQ processing.

trans-unit.source: : Jobs Setup, BoQ Manager FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : Jobs Setup, BoQ Manager FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields in this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: GAEB No.

seg-source.mrk: GAEB No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number series to be used for new GAEB files created in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number series to be used for new GAEB files created in Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: GAEB Debugger On

seg-source.mrk: GAEB Debugger On

trans-unit.source: If selected, the GAEB Debugger is activated and runs when files are imported/exported for error tracking.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the GAEB Debugger is activated and runs when files are imported/exported for error tracking.

trans-unit.source: GAEB Debugger Client Folder

seg-source.mrk: GAEB Debugger Client Folder

trans-unit.source: Indicates the folder where the GAEB Debugger Client is stored.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the folder where the GAEB Debugger Client is stored.

trans-unit.source: GAEB Log File Mode

seg-source.mrk: GAEB Log File Mode

trans-unit.source: Determines how GAEB log files are handled. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines how GAEB log files are handled.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Off – Log files are not created.

seg-source.mrk: Off – Log files are not created.

trans-unit.source: Append – New GAEB imports/exports are added to existing log files.

seg-source.mrk: Append – New GAEB imports/exports are added to existing log files.

trans-unit.source: New – New log files are created for new GAEB imports/exports.

seg-source.mrk: New – New log files are created for new GAEB imports/exports.

trans-unit.source: Default UoM Allocation Type

seg-source.mrk: Default UoM Allocation Type

trans-unit.source: Indicates the default to be entered in the Type field of the GAEB Unit of Measure Assign page when a unit of measure is missing and added during the GAEB file import (refer to section “GAEB Unit of Measure Allocation” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the default to be entered in the Type field of the GAEB Unit of Measure Assign page when a unit of measure is missing and added during the GAEB file import (refer to section “GAEB Unit of Measure Allocation” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Default UoM Allocation No.

seg-source.mrk: Default UoM Allocation No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the default to be entered in the No. field of the GAEB Unit of Measure Assign page when a unit of measure is missing and added during the GAEB file import (refer to section “Construction Setup” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the default to be entered in the No.
field of the GAEB Unit of Measure Assign page when a unit of measure is missing and added during the GAEB file import (refer to section “Construction Setup” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Default UoM Allocation Sales Code

seg-source.mrk: Default UoM Allocation Sales Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates the default to be entered in the Sales Code field of the GAEB Unit of Measure Assign page when a unit of measure is missing and added during the GAEB file import (refer to section “Construction Setup” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the default to be entered in the Sales Code field of the GAEB Unit of Measure Assign page when a unit of measure is missing and added during the GAEB file import (refer to section “Construction Setup” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Default OZ Mask

seg-source.mrk: Default OZ Mask

trans-unit.source: Defines the default BoQ Position No. format for the “Set BoQ Position No.” function; value defaults to the OZ Mask field in the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the default BoQ Position No.
format for the “Set BoQ Position No.” function; value defaults to the OZ Mask field in the Job Card.

trans-unit.source: OZ Pos. Increase with

seg-source.mrk: OZ Pos.
Increase with

trans-unit.source: Defines the default steps between each positions; value defaults to the OZ Pos. Increase with field in the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the default steps between each positions; value defaults to the <span class="Bold">OZ Pos.
Increase with field in the Job Card.

trans-unit.source: OZ Space instead of Null

seg-source.mrk: OZ Space instead of Null

trans-unit.source: If selected, BoQ Positions have a space instead of a leading zero.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, BoQ Positions have a space instead of a leading zero.

trans-unit.source: Defaults to the OZ Space instead of Null field in the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: Defaults to the OZ Space instead of Null field in the Job Card.

trans-unit.source: Free OZ Allowed

seg-source.mrk: Free OZ Allowed

trans-unit.source: If selected, BoQ Position numbers can be changed manually.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, BoQ Position numbers can be changed manually.

trans-unit.source: Defaults to the Free OZ Allowed field in the Job Card.

seg-source.mrk: Defaults to the Free OZ Allowed field in the Job Card.
